name: Ternair Profile Widget
author: Ternair

sections.description:
Ternair Profile enables marketeers in WordPress to customize and personalize content in real-time, based on complete customer data profiles in Ternair (= external customer data platform).

Ternair is a marketing automation platform for direct communication with your customers across all channels based on fully integrated customer profiles.

Ternair Profile combines the power of WordPress CMS with Ternair’s customer data profiles.
see also www.ternair.com

This plugin makes use of a thirdparty service to retrieve the data that’s needed to personalize the page content.
The data will only be send over a secured (https) connection.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Initial release

1.0.1

Fix for fingerprint support

1.0.2

Tested with the newest WordPress version

1.0.3

Tested with WordPress version 5.2.

1.0.4

Tested with WordPress version 5.2.3.

1.1

Tested with WordPress version 5.2.4.
Added a filter for a custom Ternair service URL named ‘ternair_custom_service_url’.
Added a bit of code styling to make the php more readable.

1.1.1

Fixed bug within the Ternair URL setup.

1.1.2

Tested wth WordPress 5.3.2 and removed a double variable.

1.1.3

Tested with WordPress 5.4.

1.1.4

Tested up to WordPress 5.5.

1.1.5

Tested with WordPress 5.5.3.

1.1.6

Tested with WordPress 5.6.
